package.description:
tum_sim_gazebo_plugins provides plugins for using ARDrone Parrot Quadrotors in gazebo.
simple_controller provides a motion controller allowing control of the quadrotor through geometry_msgs/Twist messages. state_controller provides a state controller for takeoff and landing.
This packages intentionally removes drift from quadrotors (which can be significant in the real world).
Six sensor plugins are included: IMU sensor plugin, an earth magnetic field sensor plugin, a GPS sensor plugin and a sonar ranger plugin.
Except hector_quadrotor_state_controller, plugins are from tu-darmstadt-ros-pkg by Stefan Kohlbrecher, TU Darmstadt.
package.author: David Millard
